thread.section_title: Precision Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Precision Tax Relief | www.precisiontaxrelief.com
thread.title: S Skidmore
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by S Skidmore

author: S Skidmore
title: S Skidmore
text:
Wow what a company, If you have any doubts or reservations about making a decesion to use Precision tax relief I can tell you that they deliver on what they say. I was walked through the process and it was explained very clearly and to the point. My case manager Lorraine Johnson and C.P.A.
Mark Jeffery did a wonderful job . They very courteous and extremely helpful with any questions or concerns that I had. I could contact them any time I felt the need too. Before P.T.R. I was not sleeping do to the stress of the I.R.S. . Now that my case is resolved I sleep like a baby again . Thank You again P.T.R.
